name: assignment
description: 1. Spin up a node.js-driven server (on port 3000) 2. Hndle two routes: '/' and '/users'    *Return some greeting text on '/'    *Return a list of dummy users on '/users' 3. Add a form with a 'username' input to the '/' page and submit a POST request to '/create-user' upon a button click 4. Add the '/create-user' route and parse the incoming data and log it to the console
